Shivah::
"Well, commander Drillbit"said Shivah politely "What do you sugest that we have to do in order to rescue Darkfate?"
  RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote: ::DrillBit::

He listened to everything between Killfest and the others in the room. 
"Killfest is right, the more we have the more die. We just need enough,
not an over kill amount of troops."
